info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 19 at 4:06PM CDT until further notice by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN OGLE...EASTERN LEE AND DE KALB COUNTIES... At 406 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located from Kings to Compton, all moving east at 40 mph HAZARD...Quarter to Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... DeKalb, Sycamore, Rochelle, Sandwich, Shabbona, Cortland, Hinckley, Somonauk, Waterman, Hillcrest, Maple Park, Malta, Paw Paw, Creston, Lee, Compton, Steward and West Brooklyn. This includes... Northern Illinois University and Sandwich Fairgrounds. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 78 and 106. I-88 between mile markers 71 and 101. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
